class_notes:
GRK 370: Homeric Hymns
This course focuses on the close reading, textual analysis, and discussion of the Homeric Hymns, especially the four longer narrative hymns (Aphrodite, Demeter, Apollo, Hermes). Especial attention will be paid to poetic and narrative technique, and situating these works within the wider tradition of both Greek hymns and Homeric epic. Assigned secondary scholarship will inform your understandings of the reading and provide a foundational basis for class discussion.
course_description: Topics will vary; the course may be repeated for credit as topic varies.
